description: From Middle English coltisfote, coltys fot, equivalent to colt +‎ -s- +‎ foot.

nouns.description: coltsfoot (countable and uncountable, plural coltsfoots or coltsfeet)

entries.meaning: An herbaceous plant, species Tussilago farfara, that grows in Europe and the Middle East.
Various flowering plants in the genus Petasites native to Europe or Asia.
Homogyne alpina (alpine coltsfoot or purple colt's-foot).
